function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Bed water content affecting the removal of formaldehyde and toluene","Impact":"Reduced removal efficiency of formaldehyde and toluene","Mitigation":"Maintain optimal moisture content to achieve efficient removal","Technologies":"Moisture sensors, automated irrigation systems","People":"Occupants, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Impact of using DBAF on energy consumption and indoor air quality","Impact":"Potential adverse effects on indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of indoor air quality, adjusting the air supply percentage","Technologies":"Indoor air quality sensors, building energy management systems","People":"Building occupants, energy management staff","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Need for further simulations in different climate zones","Impact":"Uncertainty in energy saving potential in different climate zones","Mitigation":"Conducting additional simulations in various climate zones","Technologies":"Building energy simulation software, climate data analysis tools","People":"Energy analysts, climate researchers","Owner":"Research institutions"}]}
